text:
[Verse]
Walking on the moonlight
Feel the stars so close
Wishing on a satellite
Dreaming with my eyes closed

[Verse 2]
Night sky holds the magic
Shadows dance and sway
Chasing cosmic traffic
Till the break of day

[Chorus]
Moonlight dream it's all we need
Shining bright for us to see
Moonlight dream in perfect gleam
Lost in space so wild and free

[Verse 3]
Whispers in the dark night
Stories left untold
Echoes of the starlight
Mysteries unfold

[Bridge]
Lost in constellations
Hearts align
So pure
Galactic conversations
In this dream
Unsure

[Chorus]
Moonlight dream it's all we need
Shining bright for us to see
Moonlight dream in perfect gleam
Lost in space so wild and free
title: Moonlight Dream
